thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com | 275 2
thread.title: Don Nguyen
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Don Nguyen

author: Don Nguyen
title: Don Nguyen
text:
This is the 2nd year on a row, I have been with BangGood for its reasonable price and its best customer service. It keeps me coming back for more.
Again, with my favorite customer service agent Athena Yue, who is always on top of any issues that I have to help with the products. She deserves 4 of the 5 stars I give to BangGood. Also thanks to Jeremy Lee, another good technical support I recently know.
Only one concern I have is the new shipping fee this year but it seems to me it happens to all other Chinese businesses too.
